rmsutilityr 1.0.64
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Reference

All functions

bcomment()

Wrapper function around colfmt() to make the font blue.

capitalize_first_letter()

captitalize_first_letter() returns character string with first character of each word capitalized and remaining characters either left alone or are forced to lower case.

classify_code_lines()

Creates a list object containing number of lines, blank lines, bare comments, roxygen2 documentation, and code.

colfmt()

Returns a string formated as a comment for HTML or LaTeX depending on output format.

combine_vectors()

Returns a character vector made up of two vectors, where if both are is.na() NA is returned, if one is.na() the other is returned and if neither are is.na() then the first is returned.

create_wkbk()

Creates an Excel workbook with worksheets.

dups_to_empty_str()

Replaces duplicate strings with empty strings.

expunge_names()

Returns a character vector with the string pattern within the expunge_str removed from names_str if they existed.

get_age()

Returns the fractional age in years, months or days between the start_date and the end_date.

get_and_or_list()

Returns a one element character string with correct punctuation for a list made up of the elements of the character vector argument.

get_col_width_fmt()

Returns a format statement used by xtable based on centimeter column widths

get_dated_excel_name()

Returns a character vector with an Excel complient name having the date prepended.

get_dated_filename()

Returns a character vector with an file name having the date prepended.

get_deps()

Get Package Dependencies

get_elapsed_time_str()

Returns the elapsed time since start_time.

get_first_json_message()

Returns a list containing two objects in the text of a character vector of length one: (1) object = the first json object found and (2) remainder = the remaining text.

get_json_list()

Returns list of lists made by call to fromJSON()

get_split_format()

Returns a character string of xtable format statements split up from a format statement based on the number of centimeters indicated by the parameter cm

get_split_table()

Returns a list of data frames split up for printing so that they do not exceed the width (cm) specified.

install_from_source()

Install R package from package source

is_even()

Returns even numbers from a set of numbers

is_file()

Are these files?

is_odd()

Returns odd numbers from a set of numbers

is_valid_date_str()

Returns TRUE if the string is a valid date.

latex_fivenum()

Returns character vector of one containing the results of the Tukey five number summary calculations made by fivenum().

make_date_str()

Make a date character string given a date.

make_knitr_header()

Assumes the presence of the LaTeX package titling with the new command \subtitle. \usepackagetitling \newcommand\subtitle[1] \posttitle \par\endcenter \begincenter\large#1\endcenter \vskip0.5em Capitalization is not modified by this function.

make_mult_col()

Returns dataframe with multiple sets of the original columns (cols) made from the original dataframe columns.

make_package_dependency_list()

Make package dependency list

match_braces()

Returns dataframe with ordered locations of the matching braces.

myDebug()

Runs debug once on a function that is in memory

not_installed()

Check to see of a package is installed

numbers2words()

Returns the words that describe the integer values of the number provided as an argument.

rcomment()

Wrapper function around colfmt() to make the font red.

remove_empty_columns()

Returns a dataframe after empty columns have been removed.

remove_string()

Returns a character vector with the remove_str pattern removed if it existed. Warning: depricated; left in for compatibility. Use remove_strings() instead.

remove_strings()

Returns a character vector with the string patterns within the expunge character vector removed.

remove_these_str()

Remove these strings

str_detect_all()

Detects regular expressions or fixed string values in character vectors.

str_detect_fixed_all()

Returns a logical vector with results of stri_detect() for each pattern in second parameters character vector.

str_detect_regex_all()

Returns a logical vector with results of stri_detect() for each pattern in second parameters character vector.

str_or_na_replace()

Replaces string or NA in a character vector with either NA or another string.

str_reverse()

Returns character vector where each element has had its character order rerversed.

stri_trim_cols()

Takes a dataframe and trims all character columns of leading and trailing blanks.

underscoreToCamelCase()

Convert underscore text strings such as trans_col_select to transColSelect.

underscoreToTitleCase()

Convert underscore text strings such as trans_col_select to TransColSelect.

vector2string()

Coverts values from a vector to a concatenation of substrings separated by user-specified string separator.

xt_print()

Prints xtable with gray bar
